articles.author: Rebecca Lawrence
articles.title: Billie Eilish comes under fire for 'using racial slurs and mocking black and Asian accents' - Daily Mail
articles.description: A TikTok video shared on Monday compiles undated clips of the 19-year-old singer appearing to say the word 'ch*nk', an offensive slur referring to a person of Chinese descent.
articles.content:
Billie Eilish has been accused of using racial slurs and mocking the accents of Asian people. 
A TikTok video shared by user @lcxvy on Monday compiles undated clips of the 19-year-old singer appeari… [+13750 chars]

articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: Korea quashes Indonesia to bounce back from Gilas Pilipinas loss - Rappler
articles.description: Korea gets back on track from its shocking loss to Gilas Pilipinas as it demolishes Indonesia in the FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers
articles.content: As things stand, the Philippines (4-0) has 8 points, Korea (3-1) has 7 points, Indonesia (1-3) has 5 points, while Thailand (0-4) has 4 points.
